mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT(ID_, NAME_, CATEGORY_, KEY_, TENANT_ID_, DEPLOY_TIME_, ENGINE_VERSION_, VERSION_, PROJECT_RELEASE_VERSION_) values(#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deploymentTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{engineVersion, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectReleaseVersion, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ${prefix}ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT(ID_, NAME_, CATEGORY_, KEY_, TENANT_ID_, DEPLOY_TIME_) values
(#{deployment.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployment.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployment.category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployment.key, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployment.tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployment.deploymentTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}), #{deployment.version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deployment.projectReleaseVersion, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from ${prefix}ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT D where NAME_=#{parameter} order by D.DEPLOY_TIME_ desc
select * from ${prefix}ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT where VERSION_ = (select max(VERSION_) from ${prefix}ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT) and NAME_ = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROJECT_RELEASE_VERSION_ IS NOT NULL
